ARABIC: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, help me against the people of corruption!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Lord, help me against the wicked people,"(Lot) prayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Lot said: “My Lord, aid me against these mischievous people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He prayed, "Lord help me against the evil-doing people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He submitted, “My Lord! Help me against these mischievous people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "My Lord! Give me victory over the people who are corrupt."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: My Lord! help me against the mischievous people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'My Lord, help me against the people that work corruption.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Give me victory over folk who work corruption.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Lot prayed, "Lord, help me against this wicked people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: my Lord! give me victory over the corrupt people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! Help me against this corruptive lot.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my Lord! help Thou me against people who do mischief!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "My Lord! Give me victory over the people who are Mufsidun (those who commit great crimes and sins, oppressors, tyrants, mischief-makers, corrupts).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Lord' he said, 'help me against this corrupt nation'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, help me against the people of corruption.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord, support me against the corrupting people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:30] He said, ‘My Lord, help me, by making that of which I spoke come true regarding the sending down of chastisement, against the people who work corruption’, those who are disobedient, by coming unto men. So God answered his call.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Lot said: (My Lord! Give me victory) by sending Your punishment (over folk who work corruption) on the idolaters.
